name: NWConnection.DataTransferReport
desc: A report that provides metrics about data being sent and received on a connection.

items.name: let aggregatePathReport: NWConnection.DataTransferReport.PathReport
items.desc: A report that sums counts across all network paths.

items.name: let pathReports: [NWConnection.DataTransferReport.PathReport]
items.desc: An array of reports for each network path the connection used.

items.name: struct NWConnection.DataTransferReport.PathReport
items.desc: A report that contains details about data transfer over a single network path.

items.name: let duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of the data transfer report, from when it was started to when it was collected.
